name: DiamondGuy
description: DiamondGuy is a VERY short game where you collect crystals and a key to open a door so that you can get to the Diamond! This is based off of a Scratch project that I made when I was eight years old. I wanted to make this game to expand my skills and to finally be able to say I've made a game before. I do not recommend you donate (unless you insist) until I have posted a couple projects. Thanks for checking this game out!
